column1: The Ultimates guest-star in the Ultimate X-Men's most earth-shattering adventure! It's all-out war inside the Triskelion, as multiple factions of mutants battle against Captain America and his teammates. At stake-the final fate of the master of magnetism-Magneto! Part 4 (of 5).
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.50
